data.title: Drummers are an exceptional kind of musician‚Äìas the backbone of the band they are tasked with setting the tempo and providing the...
data.meta_description:
54 likes, 3 comments - coastaljazz on June 5, 2024: "Drummers are an exceptional kind of musician‚Äìas the backbone of the band they are tasked with setting the tempo and providing the foundation of a performance ü•Å Since drums are part of the rhythm section and not at the melodic forefront, they aren‚Äôt always the main attraction. So today we want to put some incredible drummers front and center! Including: @kassaoverall, @ulyssesowensjr_, @smithches, @googlebully, Nick Yacyshyn from @sumacbandofficial, @biboye.onanuga, @kentonloewen, @konradagnas, and @jasonwinikoff. 
 
üî≥Kassa Overall is a GRAMMY-nominated emcee, singer, producer and drummer who melds avant-garde experimentation with hip-hop production techniques to tilt the nexus of jazz and rap in unmapped directions. 
üü¶Ulysses Owens Jr. leads a new ensemble Generation Y, building bridges to success and paying it forward by featuring a new crop of remarkable jazz talents that he‚Äôs discovered through his professorship at Juilliard. 
üü©We All Break is the extraordinary and innovative project is the brainchild of drummer/composer Ches Smith, well-known to fans of cutting-edge jazz, improv, and avant-rock.
üüßLegendary Bad Plus drummer Dave King returns to the Vancouver Playhouse to lend his talents to Julian Lage. 
‚¨õÔ∏èNick Yacyshyn brings tour-honed technical skill (and a few admiring accolades from Dave Grohl) to metal band SUMAC, who fluctuate between meticulous discipline on one end, and untethered feral energy on the other. 
üü™Finding its voice somewhere between jazz and hip-hop, Biboye Onanuga‚Äôs quartet bends and leans into a spiritual aesthetic and submits itself to the moment. 
üü®Local legend Kenton Loewen will be performing with JUNO-nominated breathers of instrumental fire Peregrine Falls. 
üü•Konrad Agnas is one of Sweden‚Äôs most sought-after drummers, making his debut as composer/bandleader with Rite of Passage, where he unites collaged hip-hop fantasias and Alice Coltrane-inspired spiritual jazz. 
‚¨úÔ∏èJason Winikoff is leading the Hot 5 who play early swing and New Orleans trad jazz from the seminal 1900-1930s era.
#vanjazzfest". find, me
